name: Drill the holes
description:
The machine has gone crazy. You have two minutes to drill a maximum of holes. 

Arrows indicate the key to use to drill a hole.

In green, the hole to be drilled, in orange the next hole and in red holes in standby. Be careful, too many error during drilling will overheat the drill which could break...

Credits

  • Fast Level loop (8-bit chiptune), music by wyver9 - Licence CC-BY-SA 3.0
  • Sound effects realized with SFXR

This game was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1
